TopicTitle: Wiki being inactive for about 2 years

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, was checking the wiki to see if KSP 2 has been added to the Recent changes, (it hasn't) and I put up a post on the discussion. I've noticed that the last post on the wiki was from 2 years ago. I've heard about a few things of the wiki not working properly. Could I get some clarification over the status of the wiki's activity and technical issues?

Thanks.
KSP2 should get its own wiki, otherwise the info will inevitably become conflated between the two versions.
